subject: Revision of payout structure for lawyers for LA related cases
text: HRdv <ely TTTHTf gifeaut 7ht Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (42r ma;T 3< ITyf TaT4) Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #f-5 W 6, #8r-10 , ERaw , T8 frt-110075 C-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No. 11014/11/2016-HR-I 28.10.2016 PQLCY MATERS (2148/2016) (Decision taken in LA file FTS-60/2016) Sub: Revision of payout structure for lawyers for LA related cases. high number of cases are pending with Land Acquisition Arbitrators at various PIUs/ROs etc, and which are to be disposed of as per  prescribed  timeline under Arbitration Act, 1996 (as amended 2015)_ 2. As per NHAI circular No.11041/217/2007-Admn. dated 04.09.2014 {Policy Matters: Administration (Finance(142/2014)} read with the circular No.11041/217/2007-Admn dated 04.06.2014 {Policy Matters: Administration/Finance(140/2014)}, the current fee structure for lawyers appointed by NHAl for representing NHAI in LA related cases is as follows: Dratting of petition reply rejoinder Rs. 19,000/- (Lump sum) affidavit interim application reply to interim application additional affidavit rejoinder to the application, etc: I_ Appearance Rs. 2,000/ per case per appearance and maximum of Rs. 9,000/- for 5 or more cases clubbed together 3 The current fee structure has unequal incremental fee per hearing, which leaves no incentive for lawyers to expedite disposal of cases. Therefore, to incentivize the lawyers, the structure of fee to lawyers for appearing before Land Acquisition Arbitration Arbitrators appointed under NH Act, 1956, is hereby revised as under: <= 10 hearings 10 20 hearings 20 hearings Drafting of petition Continues to be as per NHAI circular No.11041/217/2007_ reply rejoinder Admn: dated 04.09.2014 {Policy Matters: Administration affidavit interim /Finance (142/2014)} read with the circular application reply No.11041/217/2007-Admn dated 04.06.2014 {Policy to interim Matters: Administration /Finance (140/2014)} application additional affidavit rejoinder to the application, etc: 55 Gom NHA
